description: Your character wakes up and realizes that they are in a game. What do you do?
answerChoice1: Wake up and make some breakfast
answerChoice2: Get your shotgun and look out the window
answerChoice3: Stoke the fire and listen to the birds in the trees

description: You realize that you forgot to buy eggs from the store yesterday. Whatcha gonna do?
answerChoice1: Wake up and make some breakfast
answerChoice2: Make a quick run to the store
answerChoice3: Take the shotgun out back to the chickens in your coops
